title: Banijay UK (company) - Wikipedia
snippet: A month later in July of that year, French production & distribution company Banijay Group (who owns its British subsidiaries) completed its merger with Endemol Shine UK's Dutch-based global production and distribution parent Endemol Shine Group from The Walt Disney Company and Apollo Global Management turning Banijay Group into a global international production and distribution titan as Endemol Shine UK became Banijay's new British production division with Banijay placing all of its British subsidiaries such as RDF Television and IWC Media (the two were former Zodiak Media subsidiaries) into the acquired Endemol.Shine UK division and had it renamed to Banijay UK although it retained the former name until 2023.
